# Machine-readable profile: Gowtham Sridhar

## Identity
- Name: Gowtham Sridhar
- Website: https://www.gowthamsridhar.com
- Role: Junior Scientist, Applied AI and HCI Researcher
- Organization: Austrian Institute of Technology (AIT)
- City/Country: Vienna, Austria

## Expertise
- Human-Computer Interaction (HCI)
- Applied Artificial Intelligence
- Extended Reality (XR) and Mixed Reality
- Robotics and intelligent interfaces
- Computer vision and prototyping
- User experience and interaction design

## Collaboration focus
Gowtham collaborates on research and product-facing prototypes where AI, immersive tech, and human factors must work together in real-world contexts.
